title: Sample Blanket, mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: A. satin.  B. plain weave.
dimensions:
A. Warp: 84cm (33in.). Weft (s-s): 125cm (49 1/4in.).
B. Warp: 91.5cm (36in.). Weft (s-s): 129.5cm (51in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Ten different color combinations of warp stripes with (A.) three changes of weft color and (B.) only one weft color.
